## Introduction

Simple D3 Horizon Chart widget based on [http://kmandov.github.io/d3-horizon-chart/](http://kmandov.github.io/d3-horizon-chart/).

```{r test}

library(D3Horizon)

n = 1500
data = cos(1:n / 100) + (rnorm(n) - 0.5) / 10


```

## Simple Example


```{r simple}

D3Horizon(data, title = 'Testing', horizon_height = 120)

```
